macro.name: GCP_BUCKET
macro.description: Required. Name of the bucket in Google Cloud Platform storage to use for staging the data.

macro.name: GCP_CLIENT_EMAIL
macro.description: Required. Service account client email from Google Cloud Platform console.

macro.name: GCP_PRIVATE_KEY
macro.description: Required. Private key object for the service account in PKCS#8 format.

macro.name: GCP_CLIENT_ID
macro.description: Required. Service account client ID from Google Cloud Platform console.

macro.name: GCP_PRIVATE_KEY_ID
macro.description: Required. Private key identifier for the service account from Google Cloud Platform console.

macro.name: GCP_REGION
macro.description: Required when creating a new bucket. Cloud storage location for specified bucket. See https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/locations#available-locations for valid values.

macro.name: GCP_PROJECT_ID
macro.description: Required when creating a new bucket. ID number for project from Google Cloud Platform console.

macro.name: NETSUITE_ACCOUNT
macro.description: Required. The Netsuite Account ID.

macro.name: NETSUITE_EMAIL
macro.description: Required. Email ID used to access the Netsuite Account.

macro.name: NETSUITE_PASSWORD
macro.description: Required. Password used to access the Netsuite Account..

macro.name: NETSUITE_APPLICATION_ID
macro.description: Required. Application ID used to access the Netsuite Account using webservice.

macro.name: NETSUITE_TOKEN_ID
macro.description: Required. Token ID used in token based authentication.

macro.name: NETSUITE_TOKEN_SECRET
macro.description: Required. Token Secret used in token based authentication.

macro.name: NETSUITE_CONSUMER_KEY
macro.description: Required. Consumer key used in token based authentication.

macro.name: NETSUITE_CONSUMER_SECRET
macro.description: Required. Consumer secret used in token based authentication.

macro.name: NETSUITE_TABLE
macro.description: Required. Name of the table in Netsuite.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_CONNECT_STRING
macro.description: Required. ODBC Connection string for connecting to Avalanche database. You can obtain this information from Avalanche portal.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_USERNAME
macro.description: Required. Username for connecting to the database using the ODBC DSN.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_PASSWORD
macro.description: Required. Password for connecting to the database using the ODBC DSN.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_TABLE
macro.description: Required. Name of the table in Avalanche, the data will be written to.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_SSO
macro.description: Required. Sets whether to use single sign-on instead of saved credentials during execution.
